permissions.explanation: reports attribution data back to LinkedIn servers

pid.helpText: The LinkedIn Partner ID is the unique identifier of your LinkedIn Insights tag. [Learn more](https://www.linkedin.com/help/lms/answer/a417869/access-your-linkedin-partner-id?lang=en) on how to find your Partner ID.

conversionId.helpText: The LinkedIn Conversion ID is the unique identifier of your conversion.
